description:
The Shuttered Room - 1967

Horrific murders are traced to a creature that inhabits a very strange house.



The Film:

Title: The Shuttered Room
Genre: Horror, Thriller
Released: 1967
Runtime: 99 min.
Director: David Greene
Writers: D.B. LedrovAugust (film), H.P. Lovecraft & D.B. Derleth (book)
Stars: Oliver Reed, Gig Young, Carol Lynley
Languages: English
Subtitles: English
IMDB Rating: 6.3



The Shuttered Room is a 1967 British horror film starring Gig Young and Carol Lynley as a couple who move into a house with dark secrets. It is based on a 
short story of the same name writen by August Derleth and H. P. Lovecraft. 
The film has also been re-released under the title Blood Island. Although set 
in the US, the film was shot in Cornwall and Norfolk, England. The film features 
a large, half-brick, half-timber watermill, which is destroyed by fire in the closing scenes. The building used was Hardingham Mill on the River Yare in Norfolk.
